channel.title: ERC-20 on 👨‍🌾 Charlie Chen
channel.description: Recent content in ERC-20 on 👨‍🌾 Charlie Chen

item.title: Differences Between ERC 20 and ERC 721
item.description: To understand the differences between ERC20 and ERC721, let’s delve into their characteristics: Fungibility vs. Non-Fungibility: ERC20 tokens are fungible. This means that each token is identical and interchangeable with any other token of the same type. For example, if you have an ERC20 token representing a cryptocurrency, one unit of that token is equivalent to any other unit of the same token. ERC721 tokens, on the other hand, are non-fungible.
